name: Stripe Bookshop with Checkout Demo
description: A ficitious book store that uses Stripe for checkout

STRIPE_PUBLISHED_API_KEY.description: Your Stripe publishable key available on your dashboard. Use test keys for this demo.

STRIPE_SECRET_API_KEY.description: Your Stripe secret key available on your dashboard. Use test keys for this demo.

STRIPE_ACCOUNT_COUNTRY.description: The two letter country code for your stripe account for generating the Payment Request button

SUPPORTED_CURRENCIES.description: Supported Currencies - supply a comma separated list of all supported three letter currency codes in all lower case. eg. usd,eur,inr

DEFAULT_CURRENCY.description: Default Currency - three letter currency code for default currency in all lower case. Example - usd
